meanings.definition: Existing or occurring within a particular region or population.
meanings.sent1: The endermic plants in this forest are unique to this area.
meanings.sent2: The endermic species of birds are only found in this region.
meanings.sent3: The endermic squirrels here seem to have their own little community.
meanings.sent4: The endermic culture of this town is deeply rooted in tradition.
meanings.sent5: The endermic traditions of this village have been passed down for generations.

meanings.definition: Originating or confined to a particular area or region.
meanings.sent1: The endermic cuisine of this city is known for its unique flavors.
meanings.sent2: The endermic dialect spoken here is different from the neighboring towns.
meanings.sent3: The endermic fashion sense of the locals always surprises visitors.
meanings.sent4: The endermic music scene in this area is gaining international recognition.
meanings.sent5: The endermic architecture of this region reflects its rich history.
